raspilot.notifier package¶

Submodules¶

raspilot.notifier.base_notifier module¶

class raspilot.notifier.base_notifier.BaseNotifier(update_freq, error_limit=100)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used by Raspilot to deliver periodical updates from the in-air device to the ground station. Message content is obtained with the BaseNotifier.prepareMessage() method, which should be overridden in the subclasses.

initialize()[source]¶

Called once before start. Used to initialize the notifier :return: returns nothing

raspilot¶
start()[source]¶

Starts the notifications. :return: returns nothing

stop()[source]¶

Stops the notifications. :return: returns nothing

update_freq¶
exception raspilot.notifier.base_notifier.MessagePreparationError(error)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Error thrown when an exception during the _prepare_message is risen.

error¶
exception raspilot.notifier.base_notifier.MessageSerializationError(error)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Error thrown when an exception during the _serialize_message is risen.

error¶
exception raspilot.notifier.base_notifier.MessageTransmissionError(error)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Error thrown when an exception during the _send_message is risen.
